Hailburst.name: Hailburst
Hailburst.flavor: You evoke an elemental from the high mountains and deep sky, creating a short-lived shower of magical hailstones to impede your foes.
Hailburst.onHit: 1d8 + ability modifier cold damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Rain Serpent Elemental.name: Rain Serpent Elemental
Rain Serpent Elemental.flavor: You evoke a mighty elemental spirit, the legendary Rain Serpent. Its lightning tongue strikes down your foes, while its primal power heals your allies.
Rain Serpent Elemental.onHit: 2d8 + ability modifier lightning damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Rain Serpent Elemental.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. You can move the zone 4 squares as a move action. All squares within the zone are lightly obscured. Bloodied allies who start their turn within the zone gain regain 10 hit points. Each enemy that starts its turn within the zone takes 2d8 lightning damage and grants combat advantage until the start of its next turn.

Balm of Rain.name: Balm of Rain
Balm of Rain.flavor: Gentle mists form around your allies, concealing them. The touch of the mist brings healing to one of them.
Balm of Rain.effect: Each target gains concealment until the end of your next turn. In addition, one target can spend a healing surge.
